title: Dystopia - Sci-Fi Music Loops Pack
description: Experience the dystopian future with our 12 looped musical themes. Perfect for cyberpunk and post-apocalyptic video games, our pack sets the melancholic mood with a futuristic touch.
longDescription:
Our sound pack features 12 expertly crafted musical themes designed to transport you to a futuristic, dystopian world. Whether you're developing a cyberpunk or post-apocalyptic video game, our loops provide the perfect background music to set the mood. With a melancholic and haunting sound, these loops are sure to captivate players and immerse them in the game's world. Each theme is expertly produced and designed to be seamlessly looped, ensuring that it can be integrated easily into any game's soundtrack. 3 themes from the pack have 'No Drums' versions included.


TIP: Many tracks in the sound pack exhibit a captivating effect when played at a slower pace. This can be a useful technique to enhance the auditory experience and achieve a better match with the mood and context of your scene.


SoundCloud Preview

Files Included

* Now available in our Sci-Fi Music Bundle that saves you 50%!



  • We appreciate hearing from our buyers and value your feedback! Leaving a review, providing suggestions, or reaching out to us directly helps us understand your needs and preferences better. As authors, we genuinely enjoy interacting with the developers who use our product.


Thank you,

Cyberwave Orchestra

technicalDetails:

Supported Development Platforms: All
